title: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Feedback Utilization Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced scientific knowledge relevant to job roles and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customized course for managers/leaders to improve feedback provision and utilization capabilities

learning_goals: Learners select optimal feedback strategies for specific contexts by comparative analysis of 1:1 verbal feedback and written comment methods
Learners compose self-reflection reports with over 80% accuracy using mobile-delivered feedback toolkits
Learners achieve over 70% implementation rates while practicing feedback cycles (give-receive-improve) at least three times through peer evaluation systems

resources: Case study materials for science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
